summary: This document is a series of daily assignment rosters for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, covering August 3-10, 2019. It details staff shifts, post assignments, and relief changes, including specific entries for posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit) and notations for sick/annual leave. The rosters are administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

persons.name: Noel, T
persons.context: Listed as a staff member assigned to SHU #1 and involved in shift relief changes on the roster.

persons.name: Thomas, M
persons.context: Appears in shift change records, noted for sick/annual leave and assignment to SHU posts.

connections.description: Both are correctional officers listed on the same staff roster, assigned to SHU (Special Housing Unit) posts.
RW authorized shift changes involving Thomas, M, including marking them for sick/annual leave and reassigning posts.
SJ authorized shift changes involving Thomas, M, including removing them from a post due to sick/annual leave.
SJ authorized a shift change where Noel, T was relieved from SHU #1 post due to sick leave.

keyFacts: The document is a daily staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York for dates spanning August 3-10, 2019.
It lists specific posts like SHU (Special Housing Unit), CONTROL, INTERNAL, and ATTY CONF, along with shift times and relief officers.
Multiple entries show staff (e.g., Thomas, M; Noel, T) being marked for 'Sick/Annual' leave and subsequent shift reassignments, authorized by supervisors with initials (RW, KS, SJ, etc.).
The roster includes administrative details such as overtime occurrences (35), comp time occurrences (2), and total correctional services staff (116).
These are routine administrative records from the facility where Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated, providing context for staff scheduling during that period.
